title: Future warfare course to delve into impact of AI, disruptive technologies
description: The first of its kind, tri-Services 'Future Warfare' course is scheduled to be conducted in New Delhi from September 23-27 under the aegis of Headquarters Integrated Defence Staff, the ministry said in a statement.
content: A rank-agnostic first-ever future warfare course slated to be conducted here from September 23 to 27 will throw light on how emerging and disruptive technologies like AI and hypersonics will impact the conduct of warfare, officials said on Sunday.
cleaned_content: a rank agnostic first ever future warfare course slated to be conducted here from september <TWO_TEN> to <TWO_TEN> will throw light on how emerging and disruptive technologies like ai and hypersonics will impact the conduct of warfare officials said on sunday
